text: Barkhad Abdi (born 10 April 1985) is an actor from Minneapolis, Minnesota. He was born in Somalia. He has a nomination for a Golden Globe Award. He also has an Oscar nomination for his role in the movie Captain Phillips.Barkhads incredible story retrieved 8 January 2013nominees winners complete list retrieved 8 January 2013 ==References== Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Actors from Minneapolis Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American movie actors Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:African-American actors Category:American Muslims Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:People from Mogadishu
title: Barkhad Abdi
